summary: This document is a financial statement from Fifth Third Bank detailing the account activity for Scio Verum Corporation for the period of November 1, 2016, to November 30, 2016. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and the ending balance, as well as service charges and criteria for waiving those charges.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the relationship manager for the business banking account of Scio Verum Corporation.

locations: Fifth Third Bank, South Roma, Cincinnati, OH
Scio Verum Corporation, 27 High Tech Blvd, Thomasville, NC
keyFacts: The account statement covers the period from November 1, 2016, to November 30, 2016.
The beginning balance was $8,653.32, and the ending balance was $25,416.63.
Total deposits during the period amounted to $41,874.78.
Total withdrawals/debits during the period amounted to $23,686.11.
Service charges were waived due to meeting the balance criteria.
